content:
# The stone furnace has successfully produced a total of 27 iron plates, but it currently has no ingredients left to smelt, which means it has exhausted its supply of iron ore.
# 
# However, my inventory still only contains 15 coal and no iron plates, as they were all produced in the furnace. 
# 
# To proceed, I need to craft the Iron Gear Wheels and then the Assembling Machine. Since I have enough iron plates available, I can now craft the Iron Gear Wheels.

# I will craft 5 Iron Gear Wheels now, as they are necessary for the Assembling Machine.

craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=5)  # Crafting 5 Iron Gear Wheels.
print(f"Updated Inventory after crafting Iron Gear Wheels: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking updated inventory after crafting.
